player.name: Karl Malone
player.physicalDescription: 6'9" power forward, incredibly muscular build, bald head, intense eyes, most physically imposing player of his era
player.archetype: The Mailman who always delivered... except in the Finals

figure.name: Balaam
figure.attributeDescription: ornate staff of a hired prophet, symbol of mercenary spiritual power
figure.visualStyle: ancient Near Eastern prophet, hired sorcerer
figure.clothing: elaborate robes of a paid prophet, foreign mystical garb, turban or headdress
figure.physicalDescription: bearded prophet with cunning eyes, calculating expression, dressed richly from his fees, the look of a man who sells his gifts
figure.anatomyNote: two arms, often holding staff or raised in attempted curse
figure.archetype: Prophet for hire who couldn't deliver when paid to curse

connection.thematic: Both were hired to deliver but failed at the crucial moment
connection.narrative: The Mailman always delivers. Except in the Finals. Balaam couldn't curse.
connection.relationship: Mercenaries who had all the talent but couldn't finish the job

interactions.description: Two failed deliverymen, unable to face their shortcomings
Malone missing free throw while Balaam's curse becomes blessing
Standing together in their shared failure to deliver
